title: Crypto Tycoon Bankman-Fried Seeks Release From Jail Over Trial Prep and Laptop Complaints

title: Harry Potter actors, Ripple exec feud over home renovation plans
description: 'Harry Potter' actors live next-door neighbors to Sendi Young, a Ripple executive. They're concerned that Young's renovation plans will cause damage to their homes and the surrounding area.
